abstract_ssm: This collection includes on scrapbook of newspaper clippings pertaining to the 1960 air plane collision and subsequent crash in Park Slope. Newspapers represented in the scrapbook include the New York Post, the World-Telegram, the New York Times, the Herald-Tribune, the Daily Mirror and others. Coverage dates from December 16, 1960 through September 1963.
